    • Class Logic

      class Logic extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • board
          Square[][] board
          Matrix the represents the board
        • client
          Client client
          The client of that send the board
        • endGame
          boolean endGame
          flag that is true if the game is ended | false otherwise
        • i_selectedPiece
          int i_selectedPiece
          y_cordinates of the piece selected previously
        • j_selectedPiece
          int j_selectedPiece
          x_cordinates of the piece selected previously
        • lock
          boolean lock
          flags that block the board when the player can't do anything on it
        • turn
          boolean turn
          Variable that represents the turn of the players true if is white turn | false if is black turn
